verbose_text: The quantification of the mitochondrial DNA (mtDNA) 4,834-base pair (bp) deletion and mRNA was detected by TaqMan quantitative polymerase chain reaction (qPCR) and reverse transcription-qPCR respectively.
evidence: bp) deletion and mRNA was detected by TaqMan quantitative polymerase chain reaction (qPCR) and reverse transcription-qPCR
